    public class AsynchronousCalculatorServicesInboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
implements AsynchronousCalculatorServicesCI
    The class AynchronousCalculatorServicesInboundPort implements an inbound port offering the AsynchronousCalculatorServicesCI component interface.

     invariant              true

      void addition(double x, double y, long serialNo, java.lang.String resultReceptionInboundPortURI)
      add the two first parameter and return the result by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial number allows the caller to identify its call when receiving the result.
      void subtraction(double x, double y, long serialNo, java.lang.String resultReceptionInboundPortURI)
      subtract the second parameter from the first and return the result by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial number allows the caller to identify its call when receiving the result.

        add the two first parameter and return the result by calling a port offering the interface ResultReceptionCI which URI is given as the last parameter; the serial number allows the caller to identify its call when receiving the result.
